name: Crashy Rocket
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Crashy Rocket is a fun arcade, a physics-based game where you control a rocket into differents kinds of levels with some tricky levels where you will need the skill to pass in all levels!

DEVELOPMENT STATUS:

-Crashy Rocket only has a couple of levels (depends on when you download this game) with some low-effort design (not the priority).

-Crashy Rocket isn't even on his final 1.0 version, it is currently on the first release as well.

-Playtime: 6 minutes (obviously will improve that !)

version 1.0.1

(Next update: in a week or two)

BUGS AND STUFF:

-Crashy Rocket is pretty ok in bugs conditions and playability.

-Press ''L'' to skip levels and press ''C'' to disable collisions.

UP-COMING UPDATES:

Here is a list of some ideas that I will implement in the future for my game:

- Fuel system

-Dash, abilities, and skins for the rocket (without microtransactions ;) )

-Maybe enemies?

-UI, pause menu, menu, and level selector.

-A better transition between levels

-Better graphics and assets

UPDATES:

1.0.2 has been released with only 3 new levels with some new mechanics and silly trolls !

**1.1.0 is in progress with new levels, and finish the main core gameplay.

CURRENT UPDATE:

[1.0.2]

-There is currently version 1.0.4 with 7 levels, low-quality assets, no menu or UI.

(More details to come in future, stay tuned !)

SIDE NOTE:

I am a beginner-intermediate programmer in C# and this is my first game published on Itch.io and I fully understand if you think this game is completely boring or not good. Because I am just assembling basic knowledge and putting it together in Unity.

thank you for trying my game !!!
